item.title: Mariah Carey Receives First VMA With Video Vanguard Award: “What in the Sam Hill Took You So Long?!”
item.description: The superstar singer, known for her five-octave range, was honored by Ariana Grande and delivered a medley of hits, with her “Heartbreaker” alter ego Bianca making an appearance onstage.

item.title: Mariah Carey Accepts Video Vanguard Award From Ariana Grande, Performs Career-Spanning Medley at MTV VMAs
item.description: Mariah Carey graced the MTV VMAs stage on Sunday to accept the Video Vanguard Award from Ariana Grande, delivering a speech and giving a career-spanning performance of songs including “Honey,&#8

item.title: Mariah Carey to Receive Video Vanguard Award at 2025 MTV VMAs
item.description: The singer will also perform a medley of her greatest hits at the event, taking place Sept. 7 at UBS Arena in Elmont, New York.

item.title: Mariah Carey Confirms Release Date For 16th Album ‘Here For it All’
item.description: The record, the first under her partnership with indie music company Gamma, will release on September 26.
